[IMG]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/6103/tpr2.png[/IMG]

[size=+2]PC[/size]
- Intel Core i3 540
- XFX HD7850 2GB
- 6 GB ram kingston
- HD 1 TB Samsung

[size=+2]Install[/size]

Extract the files in the game folder
Download version [url=http://enbdev.com/]- ENB 0.240 [/url]
Extract the files and dxd9.dll and enbhost on the WrapperVersion on the game folder.
Enjoy!!


For better performance, edit enblocal:

[ENGINE]
ForceAnisotropicFiltering=true / (false to disable)
MaxAnisotropy=16 / ( 0 to 16 for depending on your VGA)
EnableVSync=false
AddDisplaySuperSamplingResolutions=false
and

[ANTIALIASING]
EnableEdgeAA=true (false to disable)
EnableSubPixelAA=true (false to disable)
EnableTemporalAA=false
EnableTransparencyAA=true (false to disable)

Sorry for bad english...

[IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/7285/9iks.png[/IMG]
